path: artifacts/Dalmatian Finance Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.Dalmatian101: contracts/Dalmatian Finance Full Smart Contract Security Audit/Dalmatian101

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the maximum transaction amount.
